|| *Method* || *Return Value* || *Description* ||
|| {{{getVersion()}}} || {{{string}}} || Returns a string representing the !Py3dsMax plugin version as Major,Minor,Patch,Revision.||

== class mxs ==
This is the central class of the !Py3dsMax package. Use this to access Maxscript functions, values, and 3dsMax objects. This documentation focuses mainly on the parts that differ between Maxscript and Py3dsMax.

==== Methods ====
|| *Method* || *Return Value* || *Description* ||
|| {{{namify(namevalue)}}} || {{{Name}}} || Returns equivalent of a Maxscript Name object for given string.||
